full_text: Knitted blanket for baby in DROPS Merino Extra Fine. The piece is worked back and forth, with textured pattern and garter stitch. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DROPS Design: Pattern no me-073-by Yarn group B SIZES : Small blanket: Approx. 42 x 52 cm Large blanket: Approx. 66 x 80 cm MATERIALS : DROPS MERINO EXTRA FINE from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 200-300 g colour 42, cedar KNITTING TENSION : 20 stitches in width and 26 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm. NEEDLES: DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 4.5 MM: Length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm. Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
name: Ravelry: 39-6 Terracotta Dreams pattern by DROPS design
